attributes.action: We demand a general election as we have no confidence in government
attributes.additional_details: The current government has lost the faith of its people and its own party members and it is the democratic and correct thing that a general election is called.
attributes.background: We want the right to choose a new government not have another unelected prime minister.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
